\SetAPI{J}
\section{database.auto.indexonfk}
\label{configuration:DatabaseAutoIndexonfk}
\ClearAPI
Defines whether ambeth should create indexes for foreign key columns automatically if they do not exist yet. Valid value are "true" and "false", default is "false".

%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE END
\type{de.osthus.ambeth.persistence.config.PersistenceConfigurationConstants.AutoIndexForeignKeys}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{database.auto.indexonfk}}]
database.auto.indexonfk=false
\end{lstlisting}
